game.name: Buckle Up!
game.categories: Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Shared/Split Screen PvP, Shared/Split Screen, Remote Play Together, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Buckle Up! is a chaotic 2–6 player party shooter where every round is a new mess. Battle friends across fast-paced gamemodes, upgrade weapons, fight to grab the most points, and show off your style with fun character customization. Just make sure you don’t fall off the train!
